Package is.iclt.icenlp.core.utils

Class Summary
FileEncoding A class for reading and writing files in UTF-8
IceLog Takes care of logging output.
IceTag Encapsulates a PoS tag in the Icelandic tagset.
Idioms A class for storing and processing idioms.
Lemmald A wrapper around a lemmatizer.
Lexicon A class for storing and accessing a lexicon.
PropertiesEncoding This class extends the Properties class to provide the ability to load properties file using default encoding (original Java Properties class uses ISO-8859-1, and unicode escaped characters).
Tag Encapsulates a PoS tag.
Trie Encapsulates a Trie data structure.
TrieNode A node in a Trie.
WordList A list of words.
 

Enum Summary
IceTag.WordClass
